text:

Use the following line to replicate:

```
    ["left vs right button press"],
    n_subjects=2,
    get_anats=True,
    get_tmaps=True)
```

text: Yep I get the same locally.
It looks like https://brainomics.cea.fr/ is not accessible at the moment ...

FWIW you can use the verbose parameter to get the HTTP request.

``` python

 localizer_dataset = datasets.fetch_localizer_contrasts(
    ["left vs right button press"],
    n_subjects=2,
    get_anats=True,
    get_tmaps=True, verbose=100)
```
